original_text: And Hamor and Shechem his son came unto the gate of their city, and communed with the men of their city, saying,
korean_text: 하몰과 그의 아들 세겜이 그들의 성읍 문에 이르러 그들의 성읍 사람들에게 말하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: And Hamor and Shechem his son
came unto the gate of their city,
and communed with the men of their city,
